reasoning: CIN occurs in ~1-2% of all contrast-exposed patients. Estimated incidence ~35 per 100k among patients receiving iodinated contrast agents. Confidence limited by variability based on patient risk factors and contrast volume.
source: Mehran R et al. (2004). A simple risk score for prediction of contrast-induced nephropathy. J Am Coll Cardiol. 44(7):1393-1399
